rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, you get {E} for each tapped artifact you control.
{T}, Discard a card: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}: Draw a card, then you may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost. When you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
